history.content:
* To avoid final exam conflicts with other large upper division CS classes, the final exam group for this class has been changed to "6" with the approval of campus.

https://classes.berkeley.edu/content/2020-fall-compsci-170-001-lec-001

See the class notes. The final will be held from 11:30 to 14:30 on Tuesday. I asked an advisor and the advisor told me that group 6 is correct. However, on one piazza post @11796 it shows that 170 does not allow time conflict even though berkeley academic guide shows as allowed.

children.subject: 170 will not offer any alternate exams this semester (midterm or final)

history.content:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone know if CS170 will be offering alternative final exam times. I have a conflict with another class which does not have alternate final exams. Also if anyone knows if they've had alternate finals in the past for 170 that might help me out as well. Thanks!
history.subject: Final Conflict CS170
